TopicTitle: Braking parachute for planes, shuttles etc.

Articles.Content: I assume this would only take a config edit, but I'm not entirely sure what values would make a parachute deploy while already touching the ground. Anyone who has dealt with parachutes, do you have any input on this matter?
The parachutes deploy as long as you're moving, even if you're on the ground.

The parachutes deploy as long as you're moving, even if you're on the ground.

They disappear as soon as you touch the ground.
That's because you've stopped moving (unless they've changed the code from 0.19, which I doubt).

That's because you've stopped moving (unless they've changed the code from 0.19, which I doubt).

Try slowing down a plane with chutes and you'll see what I'm talking about, it's been like this since 0.18 IIRC.
